DOC.brief_summary: To evaluate change patient pain perception use topical compound pain cream regimen .
DOC.brief_title: Topical Compounded Pain Creams And Pain Perception ( TOPCAPP )
DOC.detailed_description: This prospective , observational , single center , open label study patient receive combination topical compound analgesic medication comparator group .
DOC.criteria: Participants must diagnose ICD9 code indicative chronic pain . Participants must start new regimen topical therapy multiple compound agent . Participants must expect receive therapy least 12 week . Participants must 18 65 year age . Participants must able provide sound write verbal informed consent . Participants must prior hypersensitivity adverse event component customized prescription . Participants must pregnant breastfeed woman . Participants must diagnosis cancer within past 5 year .
DOC.keyword: Topical Compounded Pain Creams Pain Perception
